Package com.gmail.woodyc40.commons.concurrent

Concurrency utils to assist with concurrent programming and multi-threaded safety

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ProtectedField<T>
    Provides different methods of accessing, setting, and performing actions on fields concurrently without risk of thread safety.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CountingExecutor
    An executor that counts the tasks being executed and able to resize with the workload, along with block tasks that are out of the bound of the execution range.
    Distributor<V>
    Distributes a task amongst a list of CountingExecutors, using a balancer and fallback ThreadPoolExecutors to assist with load estimates.
    FieldProtector
    Factory utility used to facilitate the creation of FieldProtectors
    JavaFork
    Forks the JVM into a separate Process, which runs the heartbeat for ThreadPoolManager
    Remotes
    Provides the RMI interface to send the method call from the forked JVM to the parent JVM
    RunnableReceiveEvent
    Called when a runnable is received from Remotes
    ThreadPoolManager
    Management of thread pooling and providing balancing support between the 2 load fixed length executors

Package com.gmail.woodyc40.commons.concurrent Description

Concurrency utils to assist with concurrent programming and multi-threaded safety

All classes in this package are thread safe, unless otherwise stated.

You may examine the source of the file(s) and check for @ThreadSafe to ensure it is thread safe before usage.
